item.description: Let's all vote on where to go and the time. Then we can go where's best for the majority. El Sombrero always has a great Cinco de Mayo, but there's also Puerto Vallarta in Southington and Newington, and On the Border in Rocky Hill. If you know of another place, then suggest those too!!
item.how_to_find_us: (860)384-1825, Text if you can, it will probably be loud and crowded.... If anyone comes after 10:45 you can call/text Christian at 860-357-7264
item.name: Cinco de Mayo!!
